item.description: Charles Dickens, born 200 years ago today, started out as a reporter: http://t.co/99uFtOot What made him great: http://t.co/IWxiArw1
item.content:encoded: Charles Dickens, born 200 years ago today, started out as a reporter: http://t.co/99uFtOot What made him great: http://t.co/IWxiArw1 For nearly two centuries, Charles Dickens' colorful characters and memorable expressions have worked their way into the vernacular. item.title: Path uploads your entire iPhone address book to its servers
item.description: Some late night poking around with mitmproxy led to this: Path uploads your entire iPhone address book to it's servers http://t.co/pxb2dC68
item.content:encoded: Some late night poking around with mitmproxy led to this: Path uploads your entire iPhone address book to it's servers http://t.co/pxb2dC68 It all started innocently enough. I was thinking of implementing a Path Mac OS X app as part of our regularly scheduled hackathon. Using the awesome mitmproxy tool which was featured on the front page of the Hacker News yesterday, I started to observe the various API calls made to Path’s servers from the iPhone app. It all seemed harmless enough until I observed a POST request to https://api.path.com/3/contacts/add. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: mclov.in

item.title: Prop 8, California's Same-Sex Marriage Ban, Declared Unconstitutional
item.description: Inside the #Prop8 decision and the history of gay marriage in California http://t.co/AaMvrfTZ
item.content:encoded: Inside the #Prop8 decision and the history of gay marriage in California http://t.co/AaMvrfTZ SAN FRANCISCO — Same-sex marriage moved one step closer to the Supreme Court on Tuesday when a federal appeals court ruled California's ban unconstitutional, saying it serves no purpose other than to "lessen the status and human dignity" of gays. A three-judge panel of the 9th U.S. Circuit Court of Appeals gave gay marriage opponents time to appeal the 2-1 decision before ordering the state to allow same-sex weddings to resume. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: huffingtonpost.com
